Columns.Name: 保証_保証書発行待ち件数
保証_プラン確定待ち件数
保証_郵送手配待ち件数
保証_郵送依頼待ち件数

ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql:
SELECT 
    SUM(sub.warranty_issue_wait_flg = 1) AS 保証_保証書発行待ち件数,
    SUM(sub.warranty_check_flg = 1) AS 保証_保証確認中件数,
    SUM(purchase_order_waiting_flg=1) AS 保証_発注書待ち件数,
    SUM(sub.plan_complete_wait_flg = 1) AS 保証_プラン確定待ち件数,
    SUM(sub.warranty_mailing_wait_flg = 1) AS 保証_郵送手配待ち件数,
    SUM(sub.mailing_request_wait_flg = 1) AS 保証_郵送依頼待ち件数
FROM 
    t_object_warranty AS main
JOIN 
    m_warranty_status AS sub 
    ON main.warranty_status_id = sub.warranty_status_id
WHERE 
    EXISTS (
        SELECT t_object_order.object_order_id 
        FROM t_object_order 
        WHERE t_object_order.object_order_id = main.object_order_id
          AND t_object_order.active_flg = 1)
AND(sub.warranty_issue_wait_flg = 1
 OR sub.warranty_check_flg = 1
 OR sub.purchase_order_waiting_flg = 1
 OR sub.plan_complete_wait_flg = 1
 OR sub.warranty_mailing_wait_flg = 1
 OR sub.mailing_request_wait_flg = 1)
